content.content: With the proposed expansion to include ERC721.the title should change. I regularly wish I had got token level metadata included in ERC721: EIP 821: Distinguishable Assets Registry (Contract for NFTs) · Issue #821 · ethereum/EIPs · GitHub
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
